notes.background.$description: Background color for notes. Use for note containers and highlights.

rating.$description: Color for rating elements. Use for star ratings and score displays.

default.$description: Passive border color for neutral intent. Use for dividers and non-interactive borders.

hover.$description: Active border color for neutral action intent on hover. Use for hover states.

pressed.$description: Active border color for neutral action intent when pressed. Use for pressed states.

disabled.$description: Active border color for neutral action intent when disabled. Use for disabled states.

selected.$description: Active border color for accent intent when selected. Use for selected states.
